NK040(thi)026:1: // tshogs kyi bsgral mchod bzhugs so //
NK040(thi)026:2: glo bur gyis dgra bgegs drag po'i mtshan ma byung ba'am /
NK040(thi)026:3: nad pa tshab chen la skabs 'dir bsgral mchod bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)026:4: nya'o dgra gzugs kyis dngos su bya ba'am /
NK040(thi)026:5: gang du tshogs btab pa'i lhag ma la /
NK040(thi)026:6: dmigs rten du bya ba ni /
NK040(thi)026:7: thog mar dkyil 'khor gyis lha tshogs rnams thugs dam gnad nas bskul ba ni /
NK040(thi)026:9: ma yum chen thugs las sprul pa'i sras //
NK040(thi)026:10: ma cig jo mo rnal 'byor ma //
NK040(thi)026:11: pha rol phyin pa'i grub thob ma //
NK040(thi)026:12: skal ldan kun gyi rgyud 'grol ma //
NK040(thi)026:13: ma bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can rnams //
NK040(thi)026:14: ma thugs rjes bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)026:15: ma sku lus chung la gzi brjid che //
NK040(thi)026:17: skye ba dman la dgongs pa mtho //
NK040(thi)026:18: dus gsum sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin ma //
NK040(thi)026:19: ma bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can la //
NK040(thi)026:20: ma thugs rjes dgongs la byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)026:21: ma dgongs pas dbus su bskyod tsam na //
NK040(thi)026:22: don gnyis lhun gyis grub pa'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)026:24: sku mdog dkar mo gzi mdangs ldan //
NK040(thi)026:25: rus pa'i rgyan cha khra la la //
NK040(thi)026:26: dar gyi cod pan pu ru ru //
NK040(thi)026:27: d+aa ru cang til khra la la //
NK040(thi)026:28: sil snan mang po si li li //
NK040(thi)026:29: mi rkang gling bu kyu ru ru //
NK040(thi)026:30: gar dang rol mo khrigs se khrig /
NK040(thi)026:31: nyams myong mgur ma 'u ru ru //
NK040(thi)026:32: byin rlabs na bun thibs se thib //
NK040(thi)026:33: gdam ngag sbrang char si li li //
NK040(thi)026:34: 'gro don phyogs med ya la la //
NK040(thi)026:35: ma 'khor dang bcas pa khyed rnams kyi //
NK040(thi)026:36: tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)026:37: ma bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can rnams //
NK040(thi)026:38: ma thugs rjes bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)026:39: ma dgongs pa shar du bskyod tsam na //
NK040(thi)026:40: don 'gyur ba med pa'i nyams dang ldan //
NK040(thi)026:42: sku mdog sngon mo gzi brjid can //
NK040(thi)026:43: rus pa'i rgyan cha khra la la //
NK040(thi)026:44: dar gyi cod pan pu ru ru //
NK040(thi)026:45: d+aa ru cang til khra la la //
NK040(thi)026:46: sil snyan mang po si li li //
NK040(thi)026:47: mi rkang gling bu kyu ru ru //
NK040(thi)026:48: gar dang rol mo khrigs se khrig /
NK040(thi)026:49: nyams myong mgur ma 'u ru ru //
NK040(thi)026:50: byin rlabs na bun thibs se thib //
NK040(thi)026:51: gdam ngag sbrang char si li li //
NK040(thi)026:52: 'gro don phyogs med ya la la //
NK040(thi)026:53: ma 'khor dang bcas pa khyed rnams kyi //
NK040(thi)026:54: tshogs kyis mchod pa 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)026:55: bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can rnams //
NK040(thi)026:56: ma thugs rjes bdag la byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)026:57: ma dgongs pa lho ru don yon tan rdzogs pa'i
NK040(thi)026:58: rin chen mkha' sku mdog ser mo rus pa'i 'dres
NK040(thi)026:59: so // ma dgongs pa nub tu don chags pa
NK040(thi)026:60: med pad+ma mkha' sku mdog dmar mo rus pa'i sogs
NK040(thi)026:61: so // / ma dgongs pa byang du don phrin
NK040(thi)026:62: las 'grub pa'i las kyi mkha' 'gro sku mdog ljang
NK040(thi)026:63: so // / rus pa'i sogs / ma g.ya' ri gangs khrod 'grims rtsa na //
NK040(thi)026:65: bsgom pa'i na bun thibs se thib //
NK040(thi)026:66: spyod pa'i sbrang char si li li //
NK040(thi)026:67: thugs rje'i 'od gsal ya la la //
NK040(thi)026:68: 'khor dang bcas pa khyed rnams kyis //
NK040(thi)026:69: tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)026:70: bdag dang mkha' ma thugs rjes ma 'gro ba'i don du byon tsam na //
NK040(thi)026:71: gnad kyi gdam pa sha ra ra //
NK040(thi)026:72: bdud kyi gcod thabs si li li //
NK040(thi)026:75: de nas bsgral mchod dngos ni /
NK040(thi)026:76: phatah mdun du e las gnam lcags kyi khong sgrom nag po gru gsum pa /
NK040(thi)026:77: 'chi bdag las kyi gshin rje'i btson khang drag po
NK040(thi)026:78: thar pa'i dus med pa nad mtshon dug gi char
NK040(thi)026:79: 'beb pa de'i nang du n+ri dang tri las bdag
NK040(thi)026:80: cag rnams la log par blta ba'i bstan dgra dam
NK040(thi)026:81: nyams 'dre gdon ma rung pa thams cad gzugs sngo
NK040(thi)026:82: la skya ba bam pa rul ba 'dar phri li
